    public static class Session.Definition

    • Method Detail

      • timeout

        @Nonnull
public Session.Definition timeout(int timeout)
        Set and override default session time out of 30 to something else.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Session timeout in seconds or -1 for no timeout.
        Returns:
        This definition.

      • timeout

        @Nonnull
public Optional<Integer> timeout()
        Returns:
        Get session timeout (if any).

      • preserveOnStop

        @Nonnull
public Optional<Boolean> preserveOnStop()
        Returns:
        True, when sessions are saved/persisted at shutdown time.

      • preserveOnStop

        @Nonnull
public Session.Definition preserveOnStop(boolean preserveOnStop)
        Set/override preserve on stop flag. If true, session will be persisted at shutdown time. Otherwise, a session is invalidated.
        Parameters:
        preserveOnStop - True, for persisting session on shutdown.
        Returns:
        This definition.

      • saveInterval

        @Nonnull
public Optional<Integer> saveInterval()
        Indicates in seconds how frequently a no-dirty session should be persisted.
        Returns:
        A save interval that indicates how frequently no dirty session should be persisted.

      • saveInterval

        @Nonnull
public Session.Definition saveInterval(int saveInterval)
        Set/override how frequently a no-dirty session should be persisted.
        Parameters:
        saveInterval - Save interval in seconds or -1 for turning it off.
        Returns:
        This definition.

      • store

        @Nonnull
public Session.Store store()
        Returns:
        A session store, defaults to Session.Store.NOOP.

      • cookie

        @Nonnull
public Cookie.Definition cookie()
        Returns:
        Configure cookie session.
